name: knowsnowgl
description: Gatineau Park XC Conditions with Mapbox GL JS

scripts.bundle:prod: NODE_ENV=production && npm run bundle:css && browserify src/site.js -t babelify -g localenvify -g uglifyify > static/bundle.js
scripts.watch: npm run bundle:css & npm run watch:bundle & npm run watch:server & wait
scripts.watch:reload: npm run watch:server & npm run watch:bundle:reload & wait
scripts.watch:bundle: BABEL_ENV=development && watchify src/site.js -v -t babelify -d -g localenvify -o static/bundle.js
scripts.watch:bundle:reload: BABEL_ENV=development && watchify src/site.js -v -t babelify -d -g localenvify -p livereactload -o static/bundle.js

author: Sean Harkins <sharkinsgis@gmail.com> (https://github.com/sharkinsspatial)
